# stacker

A simple stack for R


``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("devOpifex/stacker")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(stacker)

s <- Stack$new()

s$push(1)
s$push(2)
s$push(3)

s$read()

s$pop()

s$top()
s$read()
```
